customer_reviews.title: Great Baby Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: So far I am impressed with all the products this company offers. Washing my toddler's hair is one of my least favorite things to do. She fights me every way she can. She hates having water poured on her head no matter which way I try. I have learned it is something I have to deal with. That being said, it is essential to find a very gentle shampoo because water does get in her face. In no way can I have her lean her head back. This shampoo seems to work the best at not irritating her eyes. It also leaves her hair unbelievably soft which is a plus.

product_meta.title: Mustela Gentle Shampoo, Baby Shampoo And Detangler, Tear-Free, with Natural Avocado Perseose, Various Sizes
product_meta.description:
Size:6.76 Fl Oz (1 Pack)| Style:1 Pack

Softer Hair, Fewer Tangles
Keep bath time relaxing for you and your baby with Mustela’s Gentle Shampoo. Clean, nourish, and detangle your baby or toddler’s hair all in one step, leaving it feeling fresh and soft with no residue.

Simply apply a small amount of our baby shampoo to your little one’s wet hair, massage, and rinse clean. It’s just that easy.

Mustela’s Gentle Shampoo is also a great alternative to over-the-counter dry scalp treatments, gently cleansing and hydrating without over drying.

Gentle And Effective For Newborns, Babies, And Toddlers
Our tear-free baby shampoo is gentle enough for daily use on fine baby hair yet strong enough to clean even the thickest toddler hair, all while protecting the natural oils on your little one's scalp.

Composed Of 93% Plant-Based Ingredients
Mustela’s Gentle Shampoo is composed of a 93% plant-based biodegradable formula, so it won’t harm the environment or your baby.

It also contains our signature Avocado Perseose, a patented natural ingredient that helps cleanse, protect, and hydrate your baby’s delicate scalp, and Chamomile extract to soften and detangle baby’s fine hair.

Proven Safe
Our baby shampoo is proven safe for daily use from birth on. You can rest easy knowing that Mustela’s Gentle Shampoo is:

 * Paraben-free
 * Phthalate-free
 * Phenoxyethanol-free
 * Hypoallergenic
 * Tested under pediatric and dermatological control

 

You and your baby will love the delicate scent of Mustela’s iconic fragrance that soothes and refreshes during bath time.



BRAND STORY
Skin care experts for babies and mothers-to-be for over 60 years.
